data: “Joshua Churchill’s dying in California and Nanny Ainslee’s leaving to-night for Japan! And there’s been a wreck between here and Spring Road!”
"Joshua Churchill's dying in California and Nanny Ainslee's leaving to-night for Japan!  And there's been a wreck between here and Spring Road!"
Reynolds, Katharine Yirsa, 1883-; Bickford, Nana French, 1886-1959 [Illustrator]
